page.title: 20FUTURE PROSPECTS
page.content: The electronic age has arrived in Win- teringham this year with the install- ation on top of the church tower of a self contained navigational aid owned and operated by the Humber Port Auth- ority.This may be an indication of the direction the future of Winteringham will take. For centuries much of its prosperity depended on the river. With enforced greater leisure time can we see an increasing return to the river to service leisure pursuits? Country crafts abounded in days gone by and the village still has more craftsmen both professional and amateur than its population today warrants, will these crafts further develop to furnish the know-how for the ever_nearer towns and cities? As a residential area it will certainly flourish, new roads will en- sure new residents and leisure seekers a-plenty in the days to come.
